oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Helminth parasite control in organic dairy goats
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Verwer, C
Eekeren, N. van
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Sheep and goats
Health and welfare
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This sheet can be used as an on-farm tool for organic dairy goat farmers in order to prevent helminth parasite infections.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Verwer, C and Eekeren, N. van (2013) Helminth parasite control in organic dairy goats. Louis Bolk Instituut, Driebergen.
